products.title: Piazza Modena Vertical Blind
products.description: This verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being waterproof and blackout, it is great for bathrooms and kitchen windows above the sink. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains - ideal for a bathroom or kitchen. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Piazza Modena Roller Blind
products.description: This unique design is perfect for kitchen and bathroom windows as it is 100% waterproof and blackout. The colour will not fade and being moisture resistant means it can be installed in bathrooms - guaranteed to add a splash of style. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower.
